$adminRole.description: Role identifier that considers the user an administrator. Administrators have complete control.

$execRole.description: Role identifier that considers the user an executive. Executives have second-highest control over a system, just under administrators.

$anonymousRole.description: Anonymous access permissions. These are roles used when no authorization is provided by the client.

$initialRoles.description: The initial roles to assign to a user when a new account is created.
